::: {.cell}

I am currently a Post-doctoral Research Fellow with the [Evolution of Cultural Diversity Initiative](https://evolutionofculturaldiversity.anu.edu.au/), within the [College of Asia and the Pacific](https://asiapacific.anu.edu.au/), at the [Australian National Univeristy (ANU)](https://www.anu.edu.au/).

My research is in the area of quantitative approaches to anthropological and linguistic questions surrounding Kinship, usually through an evolutionary lense. 

This website contains [a short bio](about.qmd) and as well as [blog posts](posts.qmd), [presentations](presentations.qmd), and [various tools and resources related to teaching and research](projects.qmd).
